Class TrainType2spacer

java.lang.Object
  TrainType2spacer

public class TrainType2spacer
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to train Type2spacer objects using the Viterbi algorithm that were previously created and parameterised by MakeType2spacer. On completion of training, the instance will write the parameters that resulted from training to STDOUT. These can be saved and used to reinstantiate a trained model for further use.

Use as follows: 

 java TrainType2spacer <Type2spacer submodel XML filename> <training set filename> <min length for training>

The training set is a FASTA-formatted file in which successive pairs of sequences form pairs for model training.

A lower limit can be set for sequence lengths that can be used for training. This is important in cases where the model cannot emit less than a certain number of symbols because of its topology. Attempting to train with such a set will lead to an Exception being thrown and training will then fail.

Author:
David Huen
